page.title: 17LIFE STYLES IN GRANGETOWN
page.content:
A house to house survey was undertaken in the area; the questions were given to adults (18+), and it was undertaken between 2-4 p.m. - so people who work at this time were excluded.
{1)}On average there are 4 people per house. { {2)}2/3 of the people asked owned a car, 1/12 owned two cars. {3)}Despite the number of cars, only 2/10 houses had a garage; although 1/3 people who owned a car also owned a garage. {4)}1/2 houses had a pet. Most of the people who owned a pet owned a cat.The next in popularity was a dog followed by a rabbit. {5)}1/2 people had a job. {6)}Which political party did they support - Labour 64%, Conservative 12%, S.D.P. 8%, No party 16%
